I thrive in collaborative environments where teamwork and consistency are key to delivering high-quality solutions.

testimonials.text: Morde is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Sonny has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
